name: 1930s taffeta & organza dress {SOLD}
description:
This is an amazing dress! Such a perfect 30s style with the puffed sleeves, Peter Pan collar and bow details.

This is actually a girls dress, and may possibly been made for a bridesmaid.

The skirt part is made from a cream acetate taffeta material and the sleeves and part of the bodice is a crisp white rigid organza with embroidered patterns. Two taffeta bows adorn the bodice and it has a matching sash to nip in the waist.

Needless to say, this is an extra small size, but it does just about fit me {I'm a UK size 6/8}. It is only tight around the arm holes, and is a little bit of a squeeze to put it on over the chest area, but not too bad.

Perfect for a girl aged around 11 to 13, I guess! But cute on a petite lady too.

Condition is good for a dress of this age. There is a small break in the organza on one sleeve and a very faint mark on the other. One of the covered buttons on the back is a little stained and next to it, a small hole {see photo 5}. 
This dress has just been cleaned, and has come up a beautiful bright cream and white colour. It is strong and wearable.

A truly stunning purse or small clutch bag.
It is constructed from a thick red linen and edged with a soft red leather. It has a brass snap frame and is lined in cream satin.

It has the most beautiful and unmistakable 1920s shape and is perfect for wearing with any modern outfit too!

Condition is good considering its age, however the lining has quite a few marks and some small marks to the outside on the leather and to the linen. Please zoom up the photos for better detail.

It is in strong and usable condition.

MEASURES:
26cm {at widest point} x 16cm

name: 1930s leather clutch bag {SOLD}
description:
Amazing Art Deco clutch bag, with a lovely tooled design to the front with sunburst pattern. It has leather stitching around the edges and has a wonderful soft, smooth patina!

Inside is full of surprises, two main compartments, then a clip frame purse, and inside there is another purse , one half lined in kid leather!
Amazing quality that can only be from the 1930s!

Condition is not perfect, there are some stains to the inside of the flap and some of the leather has split at the bottom.

Apart from this, it is still very strong, due to its well constructed interior onto which the leather is attached.

MEASURES:
26cm x 19cm
